/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of scale and grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with buildings on both sides, their facades bathed in the soft light of the day. Cars are parked neatly along the side of the road, adding a touch of modern life to the urban landscape. The sky above is a clear blue, with a crescent moon visible in the top left corner, adding a serene touch to the bustling cityscape below. The image is a blend of urban development and natural beauty, showcasing the harmonious coexistence of man-made structures and nature in Beijing.
